org.elasticsearch.action.count

Class CountRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.transport.TransportRequest
      • org.elasticsearch.action.ActionRequest<T>
        • org.elasticsearch.action.support.broadcast.BroadcastOperationRequest<CountRequest>
          • org.elasticsearch.action.count.CountRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Streamable

    public class CountRequest
extends BroadcastOperationRequest<CountRequest>
    A request to count the number of documents matching a specific query. Best created with org.elasticsearch.client.Requests#countRequest(String...).

    The request requires the query source to be set either using query(org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryBuilder), or query(byte[]).

    See Also:
    CountResponse, org.elasticsearch.client.Client#count(CountRequest), org.elasticsearch.client.Requests#countRequest(String...)

        public CountRequest(String... indices)
        Constructs a new count request against the provided indices. No indices provided means it will run against all indices.

        public CountRequest minScore(float minScore)
        The minimum score of the documents to include in the count. Defaults to -1 which means all documents will be included in the count.
